secretInfo - Variable in class Steganography.Logic.BaseSteganography
Contains info about the embedded data in a readable format.
secretKey - Static variable in class Steganography.Logic.AESEncryption
Secret key used to cipher the data.

setCapacity(BufferedImage[]) - Method in class Steganography.Logic.GifSteganography
Sets the BaseSteganography.capacity field by adding up the capacity of each frame of the gif image.
setCoverImage() - Method in class Steganography.Controller
Sets the cover image from the JavaFX FileChooser and adds it to the Controller.coverImageView then enables the disabled secret data controls.
setHeader(byte[]) - Method in class Steganography.Logic.BaseSteganography
Sets the class BaseSteganography.header field with information about a message to embed in the image.
setHeader(File) - Method in class Steganography.Logic.BaseSteganography
Sets the class BaseSteganography.header field with information about a file document to embed in the image.
setHeader(File) - Method in class Steganography.Logic.ImageInImageSteganography
Sets the class BaseSteganography.header field with information about the secret image to embed in the cover image.
setKey(String) - Static method in class Steganography.Logic.AESEncryption
Hashes the given password using SHA-1 hashing algorithm then uses the first 16 characters of the hashed password to generate the AESEncryption class secret encryption key.
setSecretDocument() - Method in class Steganography.Controller
Sets the secret document from the JavaFX FileChooser then adds its content line by line in the Controller.secretDocumentContent using Controller.getDocumentContent(ListView, File)
setSecretImage() - Method in class Steganography.Controller
Sets the secret image from the JavaFX FileChooser and adds it to the Controller.secretImageView.
setSecretInfo(HiddenData) - Method in class Steganography.Logic.BaseSteganography
Sets the BaseSteganography.secretInfo field containing info about the embedded data in the stego image.
setSteganographicImage() - Method in class Steganography.Controller
Sets the steganographic image from the JavaFX FileChooser and adds it to the Controller.steganographicImageView.
setTheme() - Method in class Steganography.Controller
Handles switching between themes for the main scene.
showAboutPage() - Method in class Steganography.Controller
Displays the About Page.
showingEditMenu() - Method in class Steganography.Controller
Handles the state of the menu items in the edit menu.
start(Stage) - Method in class Steganography.Main
Application entry point.
steganographicImage - Variable in class Steganography.Controller
 
steganographicImagePane - Variable in class Steganography.Controller
 
steganographicImageView - Variable in class Steganography.Controller
 
Steganography - package Steganography
The Steganography package contains the main application launcher and controller and the various packages used by the StegIt application.
Steganography.Exceptions - package Steganography.Exceptions
The Steganography.Exceptions package contains custom exceptions that extend Exception and are thrown during the steganography process in Steganography.Logic.
Steganography.Logic - package Steganography.Logic
The Steganography.Logic package contains all the classes used to handle the steganography, encryption and compression processes (and more...) in the Steganography package.
Steganography.Modals - package Steganography.Modals
The Steganography.Modals package contains various JavaFX application modals used by the Steganography package to form the application's graphical user interface.
Steganography.Types - package Steganography.Types
The Steganography.Types package contains special data types or enums used in the Steganography package.
systemClipboard - Variable in class Steganography.Controller
